ygData.msgSnippet: Yea, this week, we are going to talk about Orcs & Archers.  I m going to try to catch up by putting up pages on elves and slime. Orcs have way too few attacks.

Yea, this week, we are going to talk about Orcs & Archers.  I'm going 
to try to catch up by putting up pages on elves and slime.

Orcs have way too few attacks.

Yea, I still want a barrage of exploding bolts as a possible attack 
for archers.

Also, archers need to develop some sort of resistance to going beserk 
when they're in proximity to one of their own exploding bolts.

Admittedly, I also like the idea of giving Archers the attack of 
poison arrow when the arrow causes loss of health points until the end 
of the scenario.
